mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review(review_item_id, review_user_id, review_score_quality, review_score_delivery, review_score_kind, review_content) values (#{reviewItemId}, #{reviewUserId}, #{reviewScoreQuality}, #{reviewScoreDelivery}, #{reviewScoreKind}, #{reviewContent})
mapper.select: select r.id, r.review_item_id, r.review_user_id, i.item_name, r.review_state, r.review_score_quality, r.review_score_delivery, r.review_score_kind, r.review_content, r.created_datetime from tbl_review r join tbl_item i on r.review_item_id = i.id where r.review_user_id = #{userId} order by r.created_datetime desc

select r.id as review_id, i.id as item_id, i.item_name, u.user_name as reviewer_name, r.review_score_quality, r.review_score_delivery, r.review_score_kind, r.review_content, r.review_state, r.created_datetime from tbl_review r join tbl_item i on r.review_item_id = i.id join tbl_user u on r.review_user_id = u.id where i.item_store_id = #{storeId}
